item_category: Transform your visual experience with TCL 20 Pro 5G. NXTVISION elevates your viewing with ultra-realistic visuals on a seamless FHD+ NXTVISION AMOLED Display, while a 48MP Quad-Camera empowers you to create high-definition photo and video anytime, anywhere with Sony Optical Image Stabilization and Super Night Mode 2.0. Harness the power of 5G connectivity and privacy protection for the fastest, safest phone experience yet. Equipped with 256GB memory and 4500mAh battery, TCL 20 Pro 5G ensures you won't have to charge up or delete any time soon.
review_text:
After using comparison websites to check the specs this one kept appearing on my radar and the only reliable stockist I could find was Argos.

The phone itself is excellent, responsive, clear and fast as well as having brilliant rear and selfie cameras (that actually show too much detail in the selfies honestly - I don't need to see every pore!). Fast charging is a definite bonus and I find if I charge it for an hour in the morning it lasts all day, even with gaming and music/ video streaming.
